name: Forest Harvester Tractor 3D
description:
When trees are felled, the chips will fly — that is definitely about Forest Harvester Tractor 3D game. Here you are to control a huge logging machine and work with felling. Start the pit-sawing mission right now!
- Join the massive wood production mission;
- Drive a modern logging machine;
- Use the claw and take long tree trunks;
- Bend tree trunks with the help of the saw.

Your task is to do as many wood products as possible. But be extremely accurate, using claw and saw. Don't spoil the timber.

Forest Harvester Tractor 3D game features:

- Opportunity to control a mighty logging machine;
- Realistic and detailed logging process;
- High-quality 3D animation and graphics;
- Wonderful nature and landscapes to admire.
